name: Theater Unrest
storyline:
"Thank you, please enjoy the movie." That's all you hear by giving a strange looking ticket to the ticketmaster. His friendly voice is the only calming thing with the other creatures around in this place.

"Thank you, please enjoy the movie." The mannequin locked in the glass box seems calm at first and the shadow figure too excited and aggressive.

"Thank you, please enjoy the movie." Film after film, seems like you'll never escape this place.

"Thank you, please enjoy the movie." "Thank you, please..."
summary: Indie horror game, inspired by creepypasta "The Theater".
